items.summary: Update `frontend/src/components/sections/VisualTrustSection.tsx` so the Visual Trust grid loads the user-provided external image URLs for positions #2, #3, #4, and #6 (2nd, 3rd, 4th, and 6th items in the `images` array), replacing the currently configured URLs/asset for those positions while keeping the existing layout, ImageWithFallback behavior, and captions intact.
